message: Let's get this started, I'll give you a fair share!
You're starting high, I'm starting low!
Meet me in the middle, let's make a deal!
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy!
Getting closer to the end, let's make a fair deal!
You're getting close to giving up, I'm getting closer to winning!
Last chance to make a deal, let's split it down the middle!
